title: SSL Certificate Audit
description:
Users still see certificate errors on the login page.

Objective: Identify and replace any expired or mis-issued SSL certificates on the portal.
dialogue: Mira: "People keep getting warnings about the login page's certificate. That's not good!"
Mira: "Can you check the cert chain and help me fix any expired or self-signed certs?"
hints: Inspect the cert chain either in browser dev-tools or via openssl.
Use openssl s_client or Burp Suite.
